::Battera:;

She prayed that Iron Raptor would say yes.  As soon as Iron Raptor 
said yes, she would run out into the halland call CyberShark about 
the good new.  She thought, How could a Maximal leader refuse the 
possablilty of peace.  She looked at Iron Raptor.  "I know it sounds 
too good to be true, but I am asking that you join us."  She looked 
down and thought for a moment.  "If if would make a difference.  I'll 
stay here and you can follow my friend back to our embassy.  Your 
friends here can keep a gun to my head untill you return.  I'm 
offering my life in the hopes you will join in the peace talks."

She knew CyberShark wouldn't be too happy about this if he had just 
heard her say what she just said.
